title: net: LookupAddr returns non-absolute FQDNs when GODEBUG=netdns=go
body: https://github.com/golang/go/commit/18d27b2d754923854e05c3b37a2b799d9c063164 changes LookupAddr to return absolute FQDNs when GODEBUG=netdns=cgo, but it overlooks GODEBUG=netdns=go and records in local database such as /etc/hosts.
